meta-review.comment: God of War Ragnarok: Valhalla is a masterful expansion that delves deep into Kratos' past and delivers engaging gameplay. The roguelite mode allows the game's combat to shine, while the narrative provides a rewarding and introspective experience for long-time fans. Sony Santa Monica has crafted a must-play DLC that seamlessly weaves meaningful story into compelling gameplay. The free addition offers a glimpse into Kratos' personal journey, making it an unmissable treat for fans of the series.
